Lazy GraphQL Pagination
---

__TOC__

+ [Installation](#install)

# Install
```bash
# Virtual Environment
(venv) pip install gql-lazy-paginator
# Main Python3 environment
sudo -H pip3 install gql-lazy-paginator
```

# Testing
```bash
python -m unittest gql-lazy-paginator.test
```
